verses.verse: The humble He guides in justice, And the humble He teaches His way.
All the paths of the LORD are mercy and truth, To such as keep His covenant and His testimonies.
(Ps. 31:3; 79:9; 109:21; 143:11) For Your nameâ€™s sake, O LORD, Pardon my iniquity, for it is great.
Who is the man that fears the LORD? ((Ps. 25:8; 37:23)) Him shall He teach in the way He chooses.
((Prov. 19:23)) He himself shall dwell in prosperity, And (Ps. 37:11; 69:36; Matt. 5:5) his descendants shall inherit the earth.
((Prov. 3:32; John 7:17)) The secret of the LORD is with those who fear Him, And He will show them His covenant.
((Ps. 123:2; 141:8)) My eyes are ever toward the LORD, For He shall pluck my feet out of the net.
(Ps. 69:16) Turn Yourself to me, and have mercy on me, For I am desolate and afflicted.
The troubles of my heart have enlarged; Bring me out of my distresses!
(2 Sam. 16:12; Ps. 31:7) Look on my affliction and my pain, And forgive all my sins.
Consider my enemies, for they are many; And they hate me with cruel hatred.
Keep my soul, and deliver me; Let me not be ashamed, for I put my trust in You.
